channel.title: Windows XP copy
channel.description:
I have a Windows XP copy, since I downloaded a file from a Warez site I have been having massive problems with my computer, although I have removed the virus, edited the registry I'm still getting problems with Firefox.
When I try to search through a website, it takes a long time to load on various occasions. Although I don't mind this, the main problem is that every 10 - 20 minutes my firefox browser will crash and shut down automatically. I have downloaded the latest version and reinstalled a few times, the problem is still here.
Any ideas?

item.title: Windows XP copy
item.dc:creator: @r0ckstar96 r0ckstar96
item.description:
@r0ckstar96 wrote:

[quote="`Aaron, post:10, topic:303387"][quote author=ziplock link=topic=399713.msg2965094#msg2965094 date=1253499482]

Chrome > Opera

Chrome > Opera + Firefox + IE + 9001
[/quote]

Agreed, i started using Chrome when i came back on my computer after a nap and realized firefox was using 550mb of ram.[/quote]
that must be why I have no ram now >:(

Read full topic

item.title: Windows XP copy
item.dc:creator: @n33bz0rpl0x `Aaron
item.description:
@n33bz0rpl0x wrote:

[quote=“fozzy, post:13, topic:303387”]My FireFox does that too, it pisses me off.

With files like that, Windows XP Home is a little over 500MB so my advice would be to go to piratebay and use a torrent download, you wont have to worry about your browser crashing on you and 9/10 of them are legit (Just look for the most seeds/host)… Or you could go to a
computer store and see if they would let you burn a copy of the OS for a price.[/quote]

i download all of my torrents from demonoid because they have good seeds.

Read full topic

With files like that, Windows XP Home is a little over 500MB so my advice would be to go to piratebay and use a torrent download, you wont have to worry about your browser crashing on you and 9/10 of them are legit (Just look for the most seeds/host)… Or you could go to a computer store and see if they would let you burn a copy of the OS for a price.
